hadiths.text: Narrated `Imran bin Husain:A man said, "O Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)! Can the people of Paradise be known (differentiated) from the people of the Fire; The Prophet (ﷺ) replied, "Yes." The man said, "Why do people (try to) do (good) deeds?" The Prophet said, "Everyone will do the deeds for which he has been created to do or he will do those deeds which will be made easy for him to do." (i.e. everybody will find easy to do such deeds as will lead him to his destined place for which he has been created)

chapter.ara-name: باب جَفَّ الْقَلَمُ عَلَى عِلْمِ اللَّهِ
chapter.eng-name: The pen has become dry with Allah's Knowledge
